title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe one reason that authoritarian regimes hold elections.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how presidential elections since 2000 strengthened or weakened democracy in Russia.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how presidential elections since 2000 strengthened or weakened democracy in Mexico.

For Task D1, the response must correctly identify one factor other than elections that strengthens democracy.

For Task D2, the response must correctly explain how that factor identified in D1 contributes to democracy.

The points for each task are earned independently of each other.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the five tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
